# [FEAT] Ticket Sharing

## Labels
`collaboration`, `priority:low`

## Description
Implement ticket sharing between Zendesk instances for partner and vendor collaboration.

## Requirements

### Sharing Methods
- Share with partner instances
- Share with vendors
- Cross-account collaboration
- Read-only sharing
- Full collaboration sharing

### Shared Content
- Ticket details
- Public comments
- Internal notes (optional)
- Attachments
- Custom fields

### Sharing Configuration
- Sharing agreements setup
- Partner account linking
- Sharing rules
- Field mapping
- Visibility controls

### Shared Ticket Features
- Sync updates bidirectionally
- Status synchronization
- Comment sync
- Assignment info
- Resolution tracking

### Security
- Secure connection
- Data privacy controls
- Audit logging
- Revoke sharing
- Partner authentication

### Use Cases
- Vendor escalation
- Partner support
- Multi-brand collaboration
- External teams

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports automated ticket sharing from one Zendesk account to another for collaboration.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Sharing between accounts works
- [ ] Updates sync correctly
- [ ] Security controls in place
- [ ] Sharing agreements configurable
- [ ] Audit trail available
